snippet: The activist hedge fund Jana Partners has disclosed somewhat surprising big new stakes in the online commerce company Groupon and the game maker Zynga.
abstract: The activist hedge fund Jana Partners has disclosed somewhat surprising big new stakes in the online commerce company Groupon and the game maker Zynga.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Jana Reveals Big Stakes in Groupon and Zynga
